Directions: Read the poem about the Apollo 11 mission to land people on the moon. Then answer each question that follows.
Context: The poem “First Men on the Moon” is about Neil Armstrong and Buzz Aldrin, the first astronauts to set foot on the moon.
Title: First Men on the Moon
Author: by J. Patrick Lewis
